price: Ele é Quem vos fez a terra dócil; então, andai, por seus flancos e comei de Seu sustento. E a Ele será a Ressurreição.
arabic: هُوَ ٱلَّذِي جَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ ذَلُولٗا فَٱمۡشُواْ فِي مَنَاكِبِهَا وَكُلُواْ مِن رِّزۡقِهِۦۖ وَإِلَيۡهِ ٱلنُّشُورُ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: huwa alladhī jaʿala lakumu al-arḍa dhalūlan fa-im'shū fī manākibihā wakulū min riz'qihi wa-ilayhi al-nushūru
